text: "Fotos y Recuerdos" () is a song by American singer Selena. The song sampled the song "Back on the Chain Gang" by The Pretenders. == Chart == Chart (1995) Peak position US Billboard Hot Latin Tracks 1 US Billboard Latin Regional Mexican Airplay 1 US Billboard Latin Pop Airplay 12 == References == Category:Selena songs Category:1994 songs Category:Songs in Spanish
title: Fotos y Recuerdos
